彸字的基本解释

彸
zhōng
〔征彸〕惊惧；惊恐，如“百姓彸彸，无所措其手足。”

彸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhōng］
［《廣韻》職容切，平鍾，章。］
见“征彸”。

彸字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　彸； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页365第15
【廣韻】職容切【集韻】【韻會】諸容切，?音鍾。【廣韻】征彸，行貌。【韻會】行遽也。　又【集韻】征彸，怖遽貌。【王裒四子講德論】百姓征彸，無所措其手足。【註】征彸，徨懼貌。

彸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
彸字的起名意思

暂无。

彸
Basic explanation of words
彸
zhōng
[征彸] Fear; fright, such as "the people have nothing to do with their siblings."
彸
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhōng］
["Guangyun" job title cut, Ping Zhong, chapter. ]
See "levy".
彸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [彳字部] 　彸; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 365 15
[Guang Yun] Job Rongqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Hui] Zhu Rongqie, sound clock. [Guang Yun] Zheng 彸, appearance. [Rhyme Club] Xing Yan also.　 [Ji Yun] Zheng Yu, terrifying appearance. [Wang Pai's four sons speak on morality] The people are at a loss for what to do. [Note] Sign 彸, afraid of appearance.
